active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate how incorporating real-world threat actor TTPs (e.g., from APT groups) alters a generic STRIDE threat model for a financial organization's cloud infrastructure. Justify prioritization of threats using business impact metrics.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Organization-Specific 005_Threat Modeling (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Threat Intelligence And Hunting > Threat Actor Profiling > 005_Threat Actor Profiling Operationalization > 005_Risk Assessment and Prioritization > Organization-Specific 005_Threat Modeling). Incorporate: - Voter consensus: Full STRIDE (Spoofing: Authentication; Tampering: Integrity; Repudiation: Non-repudiation; Information Disclosure: Confidentiality; Denial of Service: Availability; Elevation of Privilege: Authorization). Include PASTA, OCTAVE, LINDDUN. Link to threat actor TTPs for org-specific customization, risk prioritization. - Research context: Threat modeling as proactive SDLC practice; identify threats/vulns/mitigations from attacker view. Sources: Microsoft STRIDE, OWASP Threat Modeling, NIST SP 800-154. Use provided Learning Objectives (Bloom's progression), Active Learning (inspire questions), Scaffolding (4 layers), Flashcard Schema exactly. Generate 75 high-quality flashcards: - Cover all objectives/layers evenly. - 40% Layer 1/REMEMBER-UNDERSTAND (recall STRIDE, terms). - 30% Layer 2-3/APPLY-ANALYZE (DFD, STRIDE application, TTP integration). - 30% Layer 4/EVALUATE-CREATE (prioritization, custom models). - Mix: 50% MCQ (3-4 options + distractors per protocol), 30% cloze/short answer, 20% scenario-based. Output JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'distractors': ['...' ] if MCQ, 'tags': ['...'], 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': 1-4}]. Ensure active recall, spaced repetition optimization, no hints on front.
